enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Response length 48, check busy after response

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Suspend CMD52 for writing bus suspend in CCCR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Resume CMD52 for writing function select in CCCR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Abort CMD12, CMD52 for writing I/O abort in CCCR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Can issue command using only CMD line

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Can issue command which uses the DAT line

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Cannot issue command which uses the DAT line

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Clock is changing frequency and not stable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write disable, the buffer can hold valid data less than the write watermark level

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write enable, the buffer can hold valid data greater than the write watermark level

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Read disable, valid data less than the watermark level exist in the buffer

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Read enable, valid data greater than the watermark level exist in the buffer

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Power on reset or no card

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DAT3 does not monitor card Insertion

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Card detect test level is 0, no card inserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Card detect test level is 1, card inserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Card detection level is selected (for normal purpose)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Card detection test level is selected (for test purpose)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: No DMA or simple DMA is selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable read wait control, and stop SD clock at block gap when SABGREQ is set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable read wait control, and assert read wait without stopping SD clock at block gap when SABGREQ bit is set

field.name: WECINT
field.description: Wakeup Event Enable On Card Interrupt

field.name: WECINS
field.description: Wakeup Event Enable On SD Card Insertion

field.name: WECRM
field.description: Wakeup Event Enable On SD Card Removal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Bus clock will be internally gated off

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Bus clock will not be automatically gated off

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: System clock will be internally gated off

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: System clock will not be automatically gated off

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: SDHC clock will be internally gated off

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: SDHC clock will not be automatically gated off

field.name: CEBESEN
field.description: Command End Bit Error Status Enable

field.name: DEBESEN
field.description: Data End Bit Error Status Enable

field.name: CEBEIEN
field.description: Command End Bit Error Interrupt Enable

field.name: DEBEIEN
field.description: Data End Bit Error Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CRC Error met in auto CMD12 Response

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Error, the CMD index in response is not CMD12

field.name: CNIBAC12E
field.description: Command Not Issued By Auto CMD12 Error

field.name: AC12NE
field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 Not Executed

field.name: AC12TOE
field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 Time Out Error

field.name: AC12CE
field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 CRC Error

field.name: AC12EBE
field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 End Bit Error

field.name: AC12IE
field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 Index Error

field.name: CNIBAC12E
field.description: Force Event Command Not Executed By Auto Command 12 Error

field.name: CTOE
field.description: Force Event Command Time Out Error

field.name: CEBE
field.description: Force Event Command End Bit Error

field.name: DTOE
field.description: Force Event Data Time Out Error

field.name: DEBE
field.description: Force Event Data End Bit Error

field.name: ADMAES
field.description: ADMA Error State (when ADMA Error has occurred.)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: In any scenario, SDHC does not send out external DMA request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When internal DMA is not active, the external DMA request will be sent out

field.name: EXBLKNU
field.description: Exact Block Number Block Read Enable For SDIO CMD53

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Exact block read for SDIO CMD53

field.name: DTOCVACK
field.description: Boot ACK Time Out Counter Value

field.name: AUTOSABGEN
field.description: When boot, enable auto stop at block gap function.\n This function will be triggered, and host will stop at block gap when received card block cnt is equal to BOOTBLKCNT

field.name: BOOTBLKCNT
field.description: Defines the stop at block gap value of automatic mode.\n When received card block cnt is equal to BOOTBLKCNT and AUTOSABGEN is 1, then stop at block gap

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: SD host specification version 2.0, supports test event register and ADMA
